data.name: RPG Sounds - Uru'Can Tribe - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Uru'Can Tribe is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Goblins Charge
  • Combat Massacre
  • Goblin Nightmare

SFX
  • Goblin Cannon Fire (4)
  • Goblin Cannon Miss (4)
  • Goblin Catapult Charge (4)
  • Catapult Drag (4)
  • Catapult Fire (4)
  • Goblin Scream (4)
  • Shaman Fire Summon (2)
  • Goblin Battle Yell (4)
  • Goblin King Attack (4)
  • Goblin King Battle Yell (4)
  • Small Goblin Yell (4)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
